# The `LoopBounds` Struct Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Below are some utilities to get the loop guard, loop bounds and induction variable, and to check if a given phinode is an auxiliary induction variable, if the loop is guarded, and if the loop is canonical. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>struct llvm::Loop::LoopBounds</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

Below are some utilities to get the loop guard, loop bounds and induction variable, and to check if a given phinode is an auxiliary induction variable, if the loop is guarded, and if the loop is canonical.

Here is an example: 
<ProgramListing>

<CodeLine><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> i = lb; i &lt; ub; i+=step)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">  &lt;loop body&gt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">--- <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/loongarch/loongarchexpandpseudoinsts-cpp/#a31df8275bbc686a779424eb21ad67d5e">pseudo</a> LLVMIR ---</Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">beforeloop:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">  guardcmp = (lb &lt; ub)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/passes/passbuilderbindings-cpp/#acdfbcf188e2d4a80837e89de2ccdffab">if</a> (guardcmp) goto <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/hexagoncommongep-cpp/#aecea88f231914d2a6dc7ecf19a57f583">preheader</a>; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">goto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> afterloop</Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/hexagoncommongep-cpp/#aecea88f231914d2a6dc7ecf19a57f583">preheader</a>:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">loop:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">  i&#95;1 = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/numbers/#a9473b507816be4056a158a41cfb86807">phi</a>&#91;&#123;lb, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/hexagoncommongep-cpp/#aecea88f231914d2a6dc7ecf19a57f583">preheader</a>&#125;, &#123;i&#95;2, latch&#125;&#93;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">  &lt;loop body&gt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">  i&#95;2 = i&#95;1 + step</Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">latch:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">  cmp = (i&#95;2 &lt; ub)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (cmp) </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">goto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> loop</Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">exit:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">afterloop:</Highlight></CodeLine>

</ProgramListing>


<ul>
<li>getBounds
<ul>
<li>getInitialIVValue --&gt; lb</li>
<li>getStepInst --&gt; i&#95;2 = i&#95;1 + step</li>
<li>getStepValue --&gt; step</li>
<li>getFinalIVValue --&gt; ub</li>
<li>getCanonicalPredicate --&gt; &#39;&lt;&#39;</li>
<li>getDirection --&gt; Increasing</li>
</ul></li>
<li>getInductionVariable --&gt; i&#95;1</li>
<li>isAuxiliaryInductionVariable(x) --&gt; true if x == i&#95;1</li>
<li><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop/#a580a6361a2bad87e6071ecc795bdae96">getLoopGuardBranch()</a> --&gt; <code>if (guardcmp) goto preheader; else goto afterloop</code></li>
<li><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop/#a25404d322e551103ea5a4af8686099b9">isGuarded()</a> --&gt; true</li>
<li>isCanonical --&gt; false</li>
</ul>

Definition at line 152 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/loopinfo-h">LoopInfo.h</a>.

### enum class  {#a1c06ad0290f168148c08edc0ce69703f}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="enum class llvm::Loop::LoopBounds::Direction "
 labels = {["strong"]}>
An enum for the direction of the loop.

<EnumerationList title="Enumeration values">

<Link id="a1c06ad0290f168148c08edc0ce69703faf3ff61f20d0c8eedfa348b0298df5edd" />
<EnumerationListItem name="Increasing">

</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="a1c06ad0290f168148c08edc0ce69703fa2e6a9b0375c021e8f650a5eb22012b5b" />
<EnumerationListItem name="Decreasing">

</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="a1c06ad0290f168148c08edc0ce69703fa88183b946cc5f0e8c96b2e66e1c74a7e" />
<EnumerationListItem name="Unknown">

</EnumerationListItem>

</EnumerationList>

<ul>
<li>for (int i = 0; i &lt; ub; ++i) --&gt; Increasing</li>
<li>for (int i = ub; i &gt; 0; –i) --&gt; Descresing</li>
<li>for (int i = x; i != y; i+=z) --&gt; Unknown</li>
</ul>

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/loopinfo-h/#l00215">215</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/loopinfo-h">LoopInfo.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>

## Public Member Functions

### getCanonicalPredicate() {#acfa250dd5ec97448681f9833e22d50cf}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="ICmpInst::Predicate Loop::LoopBounds::getCanonicalPredicate () const">
Return the canonical predicate for the latch compare instruction, if able to be calcuated.

Else BAD&#95;ICMP&#95;PREDICATE.

A predicate is considered as canonical if requirements below are all satisfied:
<ul>
<li>The first successor of the latch branch is the loop header If not, inverse the predicate.</li>
<li>One of the operands of the latch comparison is StepInst If not, and
<ul>
<li>if the current calcuated predicate is not ne or eq, flip the predicate.</li>
<li>else if the loop is increasing, return slt (notice that it is safe to change from ne or eq to sign compare)</li>
<li>else if the loop is decreasing, return sgt (notice that it is safe to change from ne or eq to sign compare)</li>
</ul></li>
</ul>


Here is an example when both (1) and (2) are not satisfied: 
<ProgramListing>

<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">loop.header:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal"> %iv = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/numbers/#a9473b507816be4056a158a41cfb86807">phi</a> &#91;%initialiv, %loop.preheader&#93;, &#91;%inc, %loop.header&#93;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal"> %inc = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm-am/#a5d0557608eaebed12bc00812724ba2cdae6bcee28992dab735eaa43f5dfa48a09">add</a> %iv, %step</Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal"> %cmp = slt %iv, %finaliv</Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal"> br %cmp, %loop.exit, %loop.header</Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">loop.exit:</Highlight></CodeLine>

</ProgramListing>
<ul>
<li>The second successor of the latch branch is the loop header instead of the first successor (slt -&gt; sge)</li>
<li>The first operand of the latch comparison (cmp) is the IndVar (iv) instead of the StepInst (inc) (sge -&gt; sgt)</li>
</ul>


The predicate would be sgt if both (1) and (2) are satisfied. <a href="#acfa250dd5ec97448681f9833e22d50cf">getCanonicalPredicate()</a> returns sgt for this example. Note: The IR is not changed.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/loopinfo-h/#l00209">209</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/loopinfo-h">LoopInfo.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/loopinfo-cpp/#l00233">233</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/loopinfo-cpp">LoopInfo.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

## Public Static Functions

### getBounds() {#a075be8282fe6debdda46c86d24a07684}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>std::optional&lt; Loop::LoopBounds &gt; Loop::LoopBounds::getBounds (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &amp; L, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/phinode">PHINode</a> &amp; IndVar, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scalarevolution">ScalarEvolution</a> &amp; SE)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Return the <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/loop/loopbounds">LoopBounds</a> object if.

<ul>
<li>the given <code>IndVar</code> is an induction variable</li>
<li>the initial value of the induction variable can be found</li>
<li>the step instruction of the induction variable can be found</li>
<li>the final value of the induction variable can be found</li>
</ul>


Else std::nullopt.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/loopinfo-h/#l00161">161</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/loopinfo-h">LoopInfo.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/loopinfo-cpp/#l00203">203</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/loopinfo-cpp">LoopInfo.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>
